title: Forestry grab or grapple
summary: A forestry grab or grapple able to hold trees and logs up to 900mm in diameter

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be a forestry grab or grapple
eligible.eligibleBullet02: be designed for handling felled trees
eligible.eligibleBullet03: safely pick up and hold trees and saw logs up to 900mm in diameter
eligible.eligibleBullet04: open to at least 1.3m when fully opened
